Name: Basic Policy
Description: The person should be from the university

Name: Expense Policy
Description: The traveler should not include private expenses

Name: Budget Policy
Description: The budget will be provided according to is travelling

Name: Vehicle Policy
Description: The employee must have a valid driving license to rent a vehicle

Name: Food Policy
Description: Only 3 meals a day is covered

Name: Alcohol Policy
Description: There is a budget of $50 for this
